
```{r}
caro_df <- read.csv("caro60.csv")
class(caro_df)
```

Step a) Specify the temporal window v (n+/-3) 6 positions:
1. pos[n-3] to pos[n]
2. pos[n-2] to pos[n]
3. pos[n-1] to pos[n]
4. pos[n] to pos[n+1]
5. pos[n] to pos[n+2]
6. pos[n] to pos[n+3]

Step b):
```{r}
caro <- caro_df %>% 
  mutate(
    nMinus3 = sqrt((lag(E,3)-E)^2+(lag(N,3)-N)^2),
    nMinus2 = sqrt((lag(E,2)-E)^2+(lag(N,2)-N)^2),
    nMinus1 = sqrt((lag(E,1)-E)^2+(lag(N,1)-N)^2),
    nPlus1  = sqrt((E-lead(E,1))^2+(N-lead(N,1))^2),
    nPlus2  = sqrt((E-lead(E,2))^2+(N-lead(N,2))^2),
    nPlus3  = sqrt((E-lead(E,3))^2+(N-lead(N,2))^2)
  )
```

```{r}
caro_df <- caro %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(
    stepMean = mean(c(nMinus3,nMinus2,nMinus1,nPlus1,nPlus2,nPlus3))
  ) %>%
  ungroup() 

```

```{r}
caro_df <- caro_df %>% 
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(static = stepMean < mean(stepMean, na.rm = TRUE))


caro_filter <- caro_df %>%
  filter(!static)

caro_filter%>%
  ggplot(aes(E, N))  +
  geom_path() +
  geom_point() +
  coord_fixed() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

Task 4:
```{r}
rle_id <- function(vec){
  x <- rle(vec)$lengths
  as.factor(rep(seq_along(x), times=x))
  }
```

```{r}
caro60 <- caro_df %>%
  mutate(segment_id = rle_id(static))
```

Task 5:
```{r}
ped <- read.csv("pedestrian.csv")
class(ped)
```



```{r}
ped1 <- group_by(ped, TrajID)
ped1 <- mutate(ped,timelag = as.numeric(difftime(lead(DatetimeUTC),DatetimeUTC, units = "secs")))
```

```{r}
ped1 <- mutate(ped1,steplength = (sqrt((E-lead(E))^2 + (N-lead(N))^2)))
```

```{r}
ped1 <- mutate(ped1, speed = ((steplength/timelag)))
```


```{r}
summary(ped1)
length(ped1)
```

```{r}
ggplot(ped, aes(x=E, y=N, colour= factor(TrajID))) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap("TrajID") +
  ggtitle("Visual comparison of the 6 trajectories\nEach subplot highlights a trajectory")+
  theme(legend.position="none")

```

Task 6: 
```{r}
install.packages(("SimilarityMeasures"))
library(SimilarityMeasures)
```

```{r}
ped <- select(ped, -DatetimeUTC)

traj1 <- ped %>%
  filter(TrajID ==1) %>%
  as.matrix()
traj2 <- ped %>%
  filter(TrajID ==2) %>%
  as.matrix()
traj3 <- ped %>%
  filter(TrajID ==3) %>%
  as.matrix()
traj4 <- ped %>%
  filter(TrajID ==4) %>%
  as.matrix()
traj5 <- ped %>%
  filter(TrajID ==5) %>%
  as.matrix()
traj6 <- ped %>%
  filter(TrajID ==6) %>%
  as.matrix()
```

```{r}
DTW_1 = c("DTW",
         DTW(traj1, traj2, 4),
         DTW(traj1, traj3, 4),
         DTW(traj1, traj4, 4),
         DTW(traj1, traj5, 4),
         DTW(traj1, traj6, 4))

EditDist_1 = c("EditDist",
               EditDist(traj1, traj2, 2),
               EditDist(traj1, traj3, 2),
               EditDist(traj1, traj4, 2),
               EditDist(traj1, traj5, 2),
               EditDist(traj1, traj6, 2))

```

```{r}
Frechet_1 = c("Frechet",
              Frechet(traj1, traj2),
              Frechet(traj1, traj3),
              Frechet(traj1, traj4),
              Frechet(traj1, traj5),
              Frechet(traj1, traj6))

LCSS_1 = c("LCSS",
           LCSS(traj1, traj2, 2, 2, 0.5),
           LCSS(traj1, traj3, 2, 2, 0.5),
           LCSS(traj1, traj4, 2, 2, 0.5),
           LCSS(traj1, traj5, 2, 2, 0.5),
           LCSS(traj1, traj6, 2, 2, 0.5))
```

```{r}
sm_1to6 <- (data.frame(rbind(DTW_1, EditDist_1, Frechet_1, LCSS_1)))
colnames(sm_1to6) <- c('Algorithm', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6')

```

```{r}
ggplot(sm_1to6, aes(x=Algorithm))+
  geom_bar()+
  facet_wrap(~Algorithm)+
  labs(title="Visual comparison of the 6 trajectories",
subtitle="Each subplot highlights a trajectory")
```
